price: 42. Dheh: Hadday jiri lahaayeen ilaahyo kale (Alle ka sokow) sida ay leeyihiin, markaas waxay dooni lahaayeen jid ay kaga adkaadaan (Alle) Rabbiga Carshiga weyn (macno kale waxay dooni lahaayeen raalli gelinta iyo u dhowaanshaha Alle).
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ مَعَهُۥٓ ءَالِهَةٞ كَمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذٗا لَّٱبۡتَغَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna maʿahu ālihatun kamā yaqūlūna idhan la-ib'taghaw ilā dhī al-ʿarshi sabīlan
